Text: #G10# As a site visitor, I want to view a course I can click on the trainer's name and be taken to the trainer's profile, so that I can read more about a trainer before registering for a course.
#G10# As a site editor, I want to maintain a FAQ section, so that support gets fewer easily answered questions.
#G10# As a recruiter, I want to be able to extend an ad for another 30 days by visiting the site and updating the posting, so that my ad remains active.
#G10# As a member, I want to have the system email me a new password or a password reminder since i have short-term memory problems.
#G10# As a Practitioner, I want to write an article for the site with a small graphic shown with the article showing my CSP or CST status, so that others know my certifications when reading.
#G10# As a site visitor, I want to email news items to the editor, so that they can be considered for publication.
#G10# As a member, I want to receive a reminder and a link, so that I can renew my membership.
#G10# As a site visitor, I want to see a list of all upcoming Certification Courses and can page through them if there are a lot, so that I can choose the best course for me.
#G10# As a site admin, I want to approve each help wanted ad before it gets to the site, so that we're sure of the quality of jobs being listed.
#G10# As a site member, I want to view the profiles of other members, so that I can find others I might want to connect with.
#G10# As a site administrator, I want to read practicing and training applications and approve or reject them, so that only applicants who qualify can become CSPs or CSTs.
#G10# As a site visitor, I want to do a full-text search of the FAQs, so that I can find an answer quickly.
#G10# As a CSM, I want to be charged a fee once I am approved for Practitioner status, so that my certification status can be activated.
#G10# As a site visitor, I want to read current news on the home page, so that I stay current on agile news.
#G10# As a trainer, I want to list my upcoming classes in my profile and include a link to a detailed page about each, so that prospective attendees can find my courses.
#G10# As a CSM, I want to be sent an email welcoming me to the Scrum Alliance and with instructions to register or activate my membership once my name has been loaded to the registry.
#G10# As a site visitor, I want to see a list of all upcoming Other Courses and can page through them if necessary, so that I can choose the best course for me.

#G10# As a site editor, I want to edit the content of the email automatically sent to new Certified Scrum Masters and Product Owners, so that I don't need to involve a programmer on simple email edits.
#G10# As a site member, I want to fill out an application to become a Certified Scrum Practitioner, so that I can earn that designation.
